mapper.select: SELECT TB_USR.NM, TB_TCHR.SBJT_CHRG, TB_TCHR.TCHR_INTRO, TB_TCHR.TCHR_PT, TB_CLSS.CLSS_NM, TB_CLSS.STRT_DT, TB_CLSS.END_DT, TB_CLSS.STRT_TM, TB_CLSS.CLSS_ID, TB_CLSS.END_TM, TB_CLSS.CAPA, TB_CLSS.CLSSROOM, TB_CRS.CRS_INTRO, TB_CRS.CRS_NM, TB_CRS.STDTCLSSTTN FROM TB_USR JOIN TB_TCHR ON TB_USR.ID = TB_TCHR.ID JOIN TB_TCHRASSN ON TB_TCHR.TCHR_NO = TB_TCHR.TCHR_NO JOIN TB_CLSS ON TB_TCHRASSN.CLSS_ID = TB_CLSS.CLSS_ID JOIN TB_CRS ON TB_CLSS.CRS_ID = TB_CRS.CRS_ID WHERE TB_CRS.CRS_ID = #{crsId}

SELECT TB_CLSS.CLSS_NM, TB_CLSS.STRT_DT, TB_CLSS.END_DT, TB_CLSS.CLSSROOM, TB_STDTCLSS.PAID_DT, TB_USR.NM FROM TB_CLSS JOIN TB_STDTCLSS ON TB_CLSS.CLSS_ID = TB_STDTCLSS.CLSS_ID JOIN TB_STDT ON TB_STDT.STDT_NO = TB_STDTCLSS.STDT_NO JOIN TB_TCHRASSN ON TB_CLSS.CLSS_ID = TB_TCHRASSN.CLSS_ID JOIN TB_TCHR ON TB_TCHR.TCHR_NO = TB_TCHRASSN.TCHR_NO JOIN TB_USR ON TB_USR.ID = TB_TCHR.ID WHERE TB_STDT.ID = #{id}

SELECT DISTINCT TB_ATTND.DT, TB_ATTND.TM, TB_ATTND.ATTND_TP, TB_ATTND.CLSS_ID, TB_ATTND.STDT_NO FROM TB_ATTND JOIN TB_STDTCLSS ON TB_ATTND.STDT_NO = TB_STDTCLSS.STDT_NO JOIN TB_STDT ON TB_STDTCLSS.STDT_NO = TB_STDT.STDT_NO WHERE ID = #{id} AND DT BETWEEN #{strtDt} AND #{endDt} ORDER BY DT
